data.card_title: Smoked paprika paella with cod & peas
data.card_desc: Cod is a great source of stress-busting B vitamins and magnesium, so why not enjoy this easy peasy paella that's also packed with three of your five-a-day, iron, folate and fibre
Try this paella with a difference, using fideo or vermicelli pasta instead of rice, with prawns, mussels, squid, monkfish and a sprinkling of saffron
This delightfully summery, low-calorie, low-fat dish packs in plenty of greens and has a yogurt, tarragon and garlic sauce
A simple seafood curry of white fish, tomatoes and whole green chillies that is deliciously spicy, healthy and quick enough for every day
This super-healthy vegetarian supper packs in 4 of your 5 a day, with avocados, roasted red peppers and spiced chickpeas

data.card_title: Spicy meatball tagine with bulgur & chickpeas
data.card_desc: Who knew meatballs could be 4 of your 5-a-day? This healthy tagine is full of flavour and low on fat, just make sure you choose a lean mince with 5% fat
A vibrant summer salad with radishes, edamame beans, peppers, almonds and herbs, drizzled with a citrus dressing
Tick off all 5 of your 5 a day with this super-healthy Sunday roast. To make it vegetarian, omit the lamb and add chickpeas to the caponata.
Low-fat, vegetarian and super-healthy, this filling one-pot lunch or dinner is packed with chickpeas, butter beans and pearl barley

data.card_title: Pea falafels with minty couscous salad
data.card_desc: Give falafel a makeover by using a mix of chickpeas and frozen peas, serve with couscous and a dollop of yogurt for a cheap but tasty meal
This traditionally rich, slow-cooked, French casserole is made healthier with lean gammon steak and pork shoulder for a hearty, warming meal

data.card_title: Thai red duck with sticky pineapple rice
data.card_desc: Marinate duck breasts with red curry paste and lime, then serve with coconut rice, peas and beansprouts for a healthy weeknight dinner
Give chicken salad a Caribbean twist with jerk spice, creamy avocado and exotic papaya.

data.card_title: Whole stuffed roast fish with fennel
data.card_desc: This roast fish dish was inspired by Sicily, where the aromatic spices and dried fruit of Arabian cuisine meet with the fresh fish and veg of the Med

data.card_title: Cajun grilled chicken with lime black-eyed bean salad & guacamole
data.card_desc: Spice your chicken with cayenne, oregano, paprika and thyme then serve on a salsa-like storecupboard salad and avocado dip - this recipe makes enough for lunch the next day
Serve your pasta with a budget-busting tomato and paprika sauce. It's a healthy choice to boot
A hearty budget meal of spiced red lentils with butternut and tomatoes. Add coriander, cumin, turmeric and a dollop of mango chutney

data.card_title: Tuna pasta with rocket & parsley pesto
data.card_desc: Whizz up a quick homemade pesto with parsley and lemon juice, then serve spooned through hot pasta with fish, tomatoes and green beans
Spice up your chicken with a ras-al-hanout or Moroccan tagine spice mix then serve with good-for-you grains and light, fresh flavours

data.card_title: Roasted red pepper & parsley pesto with penne
data.card_desc: Try a new take on pesto and blend red peppers, cashew nuts and parsley then serve spooned through hot pasta

data.card_title: Steak, roasted pepper & pearl barley salad
data.card_desc: A vibrant salad packed with yellow and red peppers, colourful onion, beef cooked to your liking and healthy grains
Give the bistro classic, niçoise salad, a seasonal twist by swapping green beans for tender asparagus

data.card_title: Pot-roast beef with French onion gravy
data.card_desc: Silverside and topside are cheaper and leaner cuts of meat, well-suited to slow-cooking. The stock and juices make a great sauce when combined with caramelised onions
These healthy burgers are full of vitamin C and use low-fat turkey flavoured with herbs and topped with spicy avocado
